turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, can you put in a starbucks order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what starbucks are you wanting to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be going by the Starbucks on Nicholasville road in Lexington Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that starbucks doesn't open for another 30 minutes. Is this okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's about when I'll be leaving the house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so what would you like from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order me a Cherry Mocha please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, what size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, do you want any milk added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Soy milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like extra syrups or whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get some chocolate syrup and whipped cream please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, will this be hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a Grande cherry mocha with chocolate syrup, whipped cream, as a hot drink. Is this all correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds right to me!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is there anything else you want to add to that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, this order will be ready for you 5 minutes after they open.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent! Thank you.
